data.description:
STORY
You are a biochemist -- one of Earth's brightest. A few months ago, an odd infection spread around the world, which became known as the Zombie Pandemic. You retreated to your cabin in the forest to evade the apocalypse and work on a solution.

Today, months of hard work finally paid off. Thousands of trials based on the latest in AI and biochemical simulation have resulted a recipe for a chemical compound that can eliminate the zombies and save the world. You just need to get to the lab, produce the compound, and disperse it into the atmosphere.

Unfortunately, this is the night they found you...

GAMEPLAY
Move around, defend yourself, and make your way to the lab. You will find weapons and power-ups that you can pick up, uncover secrets, and of course encounter countless zombies. 

ZOMBIES
The zombies will enter your room from doors, ceilings, and break through walls. They are smart enough to find a path around your furniture. 
They will attack you from a distance by throwing the zombie virus at you, or near you by scratching and biting you. Avoid them!

STAGES
Your journey to the lab, is divided into stages. When a stage begins, your room is filled with doors, windows, weapons, medikits and other pieces. 

REQUIREMENTS
Zombie Reality will try to adapt to your room, but we recommend a room with a size of at least 12ft x 20ft (4m x 6m). We also recommend some flat wall surfaces or closed doors.


Good luck!
